biotools.summary: Cleaved Radioactivity of Phosphopeptides (CRP) performs in silico proteolytic cleavage of protein sequences and reports the radioactivity that would be observed if a given serine, threonine or tyrosine were phosphorylated.

bioschemas.name: CRP
